name: Rizom Vice Grips Pliers Set, 6-Piece Locking Pliers Set, 6-1/2”, 9-1/2” Needle Nose Vice Grips, 5”, 7” and 10” Curved Jaw Vise Grip, 6” C-clamp Locking Pliers, Fast Release with Rolling Pouch
short_description: 【Wild Size Selection】6-Piece Locking Pliers Set Including 5", 7" & 10" curved jaw locking pliers (Max jaw capacity: 1-1/4", 1-1/2" & 2-1/8 "), 6-1/2" & 9-1/2” long nose locking pliers (Max jaw capacity: 2-1/8" & 4-1/16"), 6" locking c-clamp (Max jaw capacity: 2")
【Adjustable Tightening Screw】Vice grips features different jaw openings, you can adjust tightening screw in order to get the perfect clamping pressure for your different projects.
【Ergonomic Grip】 Locking pliers with soft TPR material in ergonomic design provides extra comfort and reduce hand fatigue. More efficient, operating with less effort.
【Wide-Application】Vise grip pliers set have wide application such as welding, metal bending, wooodworking, loosen bolts. Ideal for clamping, twisting and turning flat objects such as sheet metal.

【Easy To Store】6-Piece vice grip pliers are placed in a nice canvas bag, easy to access at any time. If you encounter any problems while using our products. Please contact us by email, our professional after-sales team will contact you and solve your problems in time.

name: IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP GrooveLock Pliers Set, V-Jaw, 2 Piece, 2078709
short_description: Press-n-Slide buttons adjust lower jaws 2X faster than traditional groove joint pliers
All purpose v-jaws grip on round, flat, square and hex shapes
More groove positions provide the optimum hand location for a better grip on the work piece
Non-slip, anti-pinch ProTouch Grips provide extra comfort and reduce hand fatigue
Ratcheting action allows GrooveLock pliers to be adjusted from the open position up to the work piece by pushing the handle up without press the button
IRWIN VISE-GRIP pliers set includes 8-inch and 10-inch GrooveLock locking pliers
Each pair of locking pliers has a press-and-slide button that quickly adjusts the lower jaw
All-purpose jaw grips on round, flat, square and hex shapes
More groove positions provide the optimum hand location for a better grip on the workpiece
ProTouch grips provide extra comfort and help reduce hand fatigue while using each pair of locking pliers
product_description: This IRWIN VISE-GRIP GrooveLock 2-Piece Locking Pliers Set includes 8-inch and 10-inch GrooveLock pliers with a press-and-slide button to quickly adjust the lower jaw. This all-purpose jaw grips on round, flat, square and hex shapes. More groove positions provide the optimum hand location for a better grip on the workpiece. Firmly grasp each pair of locking pliers thanks to the ProTouch grips.

name: Crescent 5 Piece Curved & Long Nose Locking Plier Set | CLP5SETN-08
short_description: Versatile curved jaw also features integral wire cutter
Angled tooth pattern for a better grip
Knurled adjusting screw turns easily by hand or with a hex key inserted into the hex key receiver on bottom of screw
After initial grip is set, pliers can be tightened further by turning the adjusting screw with a hex key
product_description: Crescent locking pliers are made to an exacting standards that result in improved durability and long-term performance. They meet stringent ASME B107.24 and B107.36 standards, as applicable, including standards for strength and maximum jaw capacity. All Crescent locking pliers have a cushion grip trigger release for easier opening and large hex key recess for additional leverage when tightening. The head and body also have a narrow profile necessary for work in tight and confined spaces.

name: Klein Tools 38660 Locking Pliers Set, 7-Inch and 10-Inch Curved Jaw Pliers, Quick Release Handles, High Torque and Gripping Power, 2-Piece
short_description: HIGH LOCKING FORCE PLIERS: Expertly designed for a secure hold with maximum locking force
ALL-DAY COMFORT: Molded grips on pliers for long-lasting comfort during extended use
PINCH-FREE DESIGN: Lever-less quick release handles ensure pinch free operation
EFFORTLESS ADJUSTMENT: Modify sizes with an intuitive thumb knob for quick and easy changes
RUST PREVENTATIVE COATING: Provides optimal protection against corrosion
EXCEPTIONAL GRIPPING POWER: Hardened teeth provide high torque to the workpiece
CURVED JAWS: Classic curved jaw design provides gripping power on a large variety of objects
product_description: Unlock exceptional gripping power and unparalleled torque with Klein Tools' 7-Inch (Cat. No. 38601) and 10-Inch (Cat. No. 38602) Curved Jaw Locking Pliers. Expertly designed for high locking force, these pliers bring toughness to your projects. The intuitive thumb knob ensures effortless and swift size adjustments, while the lever-less design, combined with molded grips, guarantees a pinch-free experience and effortless handle opening for unrivaled comfort throughout the workday. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

Adjustable Screw Design: The adjustable screw is perfect for different jaw openings, providing the ideal clamping pressure for all different tasks and making your work easier
Perfect Trigger Design&Ergonomic Handle Design: Provide maximum locking force and comfort, non-slip hand grip

name: 16PCS Locking Pliers Set, Carbon Steel, Fast Release, Curved Jaw, Long Nose, Straight Jaw, U-Shaped,Pinch Off,C-clamp, Chain Clamp, Sheet Metal Clamp w/Multifunction Oxford Tool Bag
short_description: The KARRYTON 16PCS Locking Pliers Set is a versatile toolkit featuring a wide range of tools for various tasks. Set includes 3 Curved Jaw Pliers (5", 7", 10"), 3 Long Nose Pliers (5", 6", 9"), 3 Straight Jaw Pliers (5", 7", 10"), 3 C-clamp Pliers (6", 11" with swivel pads, 11" with regular tip), an 8" Sheet Metal Clamp, a 9" U-shaped Clamp, a 9" Chain Clamp, and a 7" Pinch Off Plier. All these locking pliers come in a durable Oxford cloth tool bag for easy storage and transport. A pair of industrial-grade working gloves is also included.

The KARRYTON Locking Pliers Set is crafted from high-quality carbon steel, ensuring maximum durability and strength. Each plier is designed to maintain its shape and functionality even under prolonged use and harsh conditions. Hardened teeth are designed to grip from all angles. This material choice guarantees that your tools will remain reliable and effective for years to come, providing consistent performance in every job.

The KARRYTON set features ergonomic handles with non-slip grips for comfort and control, even when wearing gloves. Its highlight is the quick release mechanism, which allows one-handed operation. This feature enables users to easily adjust and release the pliers with minimal effort, enhancing efficiency and convenience. Whether you're working on a tight schedule or in challenging conditions, the quick release function ensures smooth, hassle-free operation.

The KARRYTON Locking Pliers Set features an adjustable design that allows for precise control over the jaw opening and clamping force. Each plier includes a knurled adjustment screw, enabling users to fine-tune the grip to accommodate different thicknesses and shapes of materials. This design ensures a secure hold without damaging the workpiece, making it ideal for various tasks.

The KARRYTON 16PCS Locking Pliers Set is designed for a wide range of applications, making it essential for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Whether you're a mechanic, plumber, electrician, or hobbyist, this set provides the tools needed for pipe repair, welding, sheet metal work, and general maintenance. The variety of sizes and types ensures that you have the right tool for every job. Its portable design and durable construction make it ideal for on-site work or home projects.

name: Lichamp Locking Pliers Set - 10 inch Curved Jaw and 9 inch Long Nose Vise Pliers, Vise Grips for Automotive, Plumbing, Metalworking
short_description: LOCK PLIERS SET: Includes 10 inches curved jaw locking plier and 9 inches long nose locking pliers, these curved or straight jaw also features integral wire cutter
CURVED JAW PLIERS: Curved locking piler have rounded jaws and are used to securely grip and hold rounded objects like pipes, as well as nuts, bolts and any other hexagonal objects

LOCKING PLIERS NEEDLE: Long nose pliers were needled nose pliers with straight and longer jaws, can reach into even narrower gaps to clamp objects, and are ideal for delicate work such as model making
STRONG MOLE WRENCH: Built from high-grade, heat-treated Chrome Vanadium Steel, featuring great toughness and won't deform. Nickel-plated finish resists rust and corrosion

VISE TYPE GRIP: Classic trigger release with hardened teeth design provides maximum locking force and will grip a variety of shapes from any angle. Includes handy hex key for convenient knurl hole adjustment

No. 38611), and 10-Inch Curved Jaw Locking Pliers (Cat. No. 38602). Engineered for maximum locking force, they are ideal for clamping, turning round objects, and working in confined areas.
